title: Print, "Laban reproves Jacob for leaving secretely", 1725–45
medium: Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper
inscribed: At bottom left: "a Paris chez Charpentier rue St. jacques au Coq."; right: "Laban pur/quis'etoit enalle sans lui rien dire dont Rachel et Lia."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Left side of a panel. The two men are at right, under a tree. At left are four men, three of whom carry spears, and a horse. In rocky landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Laban reproves Jacob for leaving secretely", 1725–45.
1725–45. Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-287.
